title: Intend shows negative offset inverted enduro fork w/ dramatic head angle
content:
In other words, Intend has just created the “high pivot” equivalent of a suspension fork. Meaning, they’ve taken the rear-ward axle path benefits from the latest crop of mountain bikes and applied it to the front of the bike, which should help you smash through big hits faster than ever! The post Intend shows negative offset inverted enduro fork w/ dramatic head angle appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
